alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 10:33AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dale, southern Coffee, Geneva, northern Walton, Holmes and north central Washington Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1033 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Florala to 10 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs to near Vernon. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Vernon, Bonifay, Geneva, Enterprise, Hartford, Slocomb, Samson, New Brockton, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Caryville, Esto, Westville and Coffee Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
